price: ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߢߌ߬ߡߊ ߞߍ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߘߏߦߌ߲߫
arabic: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَإِنَّهُۥ يَتُوبُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَتَابٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waman tāba waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-innahu yatūbu ilā al-lahi matāban
